title.narrative: 2015 UG043 Move Forward Empowering Girls and Young Women

description.narrative: Uganda is recovering from the brutal conflict between the Ugandan government and rebel group the Lords Resistance Army which ended in 2006. Children and young people in the country still experience rights violations and economic opportunities are scarce. This project provides safe spaces for girls and young women in sex work, where they can access information about support services, share experiences, rest and get psychosocial treatment or education. Awareness raising in the community also helps to improve acceptance and reduce stigma against these girls and young women.

participating-org.narrative: Aids Fonds - STOP AIDS NOW! - Soa Aids Nederland

sector.narrative: CP = Child Protection, PSS = Psychosocial Support
